text: <@UEKMY50SU> so should I link the base dir to the work/hubthemes/themename directory and just upload only the files from HubSpot? Because if I do that I get errors because files don't exist
Thank you <@U26B530N6> I will take a look whilst I discuss with Brian! :slightly_smiling_face:
Have you synced your `designs` directory from ftp?

info on setting up ftp (if you haven't already) is found here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/HubSpot-ftp>

basically, what you want to do is copy your files over from there and copy them into your project (`work/hubthemes/` would be a good place). then, in `conf/config.yaml`, update the value of `templateBaseDir` to be `work/hubthemes/<yourDirectoryName>`. let me know if you do that and are still having issues
I've imported my all the images from one portal to another but the links should not change <https://cdn2.HubSpot.net/hubfs/255555/Final_Webdew/final-webdew-img/center-img-HubSpot-explainer.png>
